title: Too many ads
text:
First of all I use this app basically all day, music for when I work, tutorials, ASMR for sleep etc. I enjoy the app but two ads for each video I watch? C‚Äômon now, I‚Äôm not trying to be glued to my phone in order to enjoy my tunes. It is also really frustrating to have to stop what I‚Äôm doing to click the phone screen just to skip the ad. So give us the option to skip the ad with our headphones.
    And I know of the premium option but not everyone can afford it and even if one could, why would someone want to play $120 a year for a free platform?  
There are other minuscule problems I can‚Äôt think of at the moment, but the ones mentioned above are enough for  a person to stop using the app for music.

title: Over all great but...
text: Okay this this a really good app, but the advertisements. There used to be only one but now there is 2?!? Now I get that they need money but if the video has 5 ads set up then you have 10 ads. And sometimes it glitches and you get 3. also COPA, I don‚Äôt know if you have heard of it, you probably have. If not look it up. Now I am a teen and I watch videos of lps, they are toys but the story‚Äôs are NOT for kids. Then they had to leave because they weren‚Äôt getting money and were not doing so well. Just why? I suggest that you send a email asking if it‚Äôs for kids, because apparently a murder story is for children because they are made from toy. That‚Äôs not how it works hun, of course I know these all have reasons but that‚Äôs kinda  s t r e t c h i n g  it a bit.. I won‚Äôt complain anymore, that‚Äôs it please get COPA sorted out, that‚Äôs my main thing. Thanks!

title: Couldn‚Äôt be More Pleased!
text: I am absolutely so happy with upgrading to premium. Worth more than every penny!  No ads, the content is great, the suggestions are on point, and those that are not are easily eliminated with the ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt recommend this channel‚Äù feature. There are free movies and the option to listen while my phone screen is not active saves my battery while I‚Äôm listening but not watching.  The range of content is unparalleled. Everything from movies to documentaries, to home videos, news casts, archive historical footage and beyond. It is so good, I am considering discontinuing other streaming services. Thank you for the quality product at an affordable price!  Keep up the good work

title: Censorship to downfall
text:
Since the employees at Utube can‚Äôt seem to figure out simple logic and unbiased opinion, the business as a whole has taken a huge loss in revenue and users. 
Once an open forum of ideals and amateur everything, Utube has forcefully implemented a manufactured algorithm/s to search for any channel or opinion that is different than the select few they deem allowable. 
In a ridiculous ploy to show favoritism to some and hatred to others these algorithms were specifically designed to show extrem prejudice to any opposing view other than that of the few that run the company. 
Now with new platforms that are non discriminate and free from tyranny control being created, the future of Utube is bleak and needs to be. 
Those that forced Utube to undergo this extreme liberal change should be held accountable by all facets and re-educated on what reality is and is acceptable. As well as legal implications are due civilly to correct this type of bad behavior.

title: 99% of the YT Experience on the Go
text:
The app does everything the main site does anywhere you have data. Videos are clear, sound is great, etc and I burn many, many hours at a desk job listening to game play or podcasts or similar.  

I only really have two qualms. One: When making a comment if you have to ‚Äúedit‚Äù it or similar even before posting the cursor will move erratically from top to bottom of it and then back to where you had it. Two: Recently the app started playing videos that appear in your Recommended if you stop scrolling for even a few seconds. This leads to them appearing in your History and further warping your Recommended. Not a fan of that. But those are honestly minor all things considered. It does the job very well for an app. Highly recommended.

title: Auto clicks
text:
In the middle of a video I am watching, it auto clicks the next video when I am watching a video. I hate it but that doesn‚Äôt mean I hate hate it. It is still a good app but I would like to see that be removed or I may just be on my part. I dunno. Also, this only happens on my phone but in the middle of a video, the screen goes dark but there‚Äôs still audio, so I have to click to the next vid then go back to the one I was watching and have to deal with it staring over or like 20 seconds before the point I was at. Me and my Dad have the same phone (Samsung J3 Emerge ) and I asked him if he has the same issue an me, he does not, so idk if it‚Äôs just my phone or more widespread than I think it is. But overall a great app and gave it a 4/5 stars. 

Sorry for any spelling mistakes that are in my review.

title: Subscription feed buries content
text: Please make it that viewed videos vanish from the subscription feed. I am subscribed to multiple creators and I miss approximately 80% of the videos I am subscribed to because they get buried under viewed videos. I don‚Äôt have the patience or the willpower to scroll down through all of the viewed videos to find ones I haven‚Äôt viewed. Especially when the subscription feed keeps resetting itself by scrolling back to the top. Please give us an option to where viewed videos remove themselves from the subscription feed or maybe we could simply swipe to remove them ourselves. I imagine you will find that more videos are watched and not lost to the flood of videos previously viewed.

title: Garbage. Why am i paying?
text: I opted to pay so i dont have to listen to commercials and listen while screen is off. The player will stop playing at random. Sometimes 1 song sometimes as high as 7 songs. And i have to pull my phone out every few songs to start the playing. Its really annoying because when im working my hands are often wet or busy. And the shuffle is not random. It starts from the same song and plays the same order and loves to play the same songs. There are songs i havent heard in a while that id like to occasionally hear but it never plays those songs. I even tried thumbs downing the songs it likes to play and now basically it plays all the thumbs down songs and not the thumbs up songs. This truly is the worst player and doesnt know how to be one. This is coming from the leader in this industry. Complete garbage and waste of money. An ipod would cheaper and do a better job

title: THE QUEUE FEATURE
text: My only complaint about this app is the fact that it doesn‚Äôt have the option to queue videos like you can in the web version. It has the mini player but you can‚Äôt queue??? What senses does that make? The mini player is kind of useless without it because the whole point is to see other videos you want to watch next. I rely on that feature so much that it‚Äôs frustrating when I have to add things to playlists which is such a hassle. It doesn‚Äôt make for an optimal user/viewing experience. I would have thought that the Google/YouTube team would have added this feature soon after it was available on the website yet here we are. It‚Äôs the end of July 2021 and there is still no queue.

title: Stop with the ads
text: I‚Äôm sick and tired of getting ads for the beginning of EVERY VIDEO, I guarantee you that a video for 7 years ago does not need an ad from present day, also stop with double ads, I don‚Äôt care about the product nor the company, if I did I would watch videos about it, ‚Äúbut it‚Äôs supposed to spark your interest as a consumer‚Äù yes because a military veteran retirement home plan is totally what I need as a young adult, just let me choose my advertisements, I‚Äôd rather look at nerf guns instead of some Spanish ad about a phone service I don‚Äôt use, and I don‚Äôt even speak Spanish, I don‚Äôt even watch Spanish videos, it‚Äôs ridiculous how I‚Äôm trying to enjoy the platform you made but no, you ruin it by bombarding me with ‚Äú buy this‚Äù, ‚Äú no buy this!‚Äù, ‚Äú please waste your money here‚Äù so on and so forth, also for every ad I get that‚Äôs a double ad, I will also review it as one star thanks to you, I don‚Äôt even know the product or company but you‚Äôve lead me to this decision.

title: Would rate zero if I could...
text: Youtube‚Äôs view counts are ridiculous and they don‚Äôt even bother to explain why they delete views? They‚Äôve claimed in the past that they freeze views, but they‚Äôre clearly DELETING VIEWS. I don‚Äôt understand? No other artist, but BTS gets an insane amount of views deleted? Do they have something against them because it makes no sense anymore. They don‚Äôt even bother to address the issue and pretend nothing happened. Tell me how the ON music video by BTS received 10 million within the first hour, but only under 45 million in 24 hours? It‚Äôs nonsense! Then, they delete 5 million before everyone‚Äôs eyes right before the 24 hours ??? What‚Äôs that about? I‚Äôm not surprised since they ALWAYS delete views from BTS‚Äô music videos and claim it‚Äôs bots. But this time they owe it to everyone to actually do something about it and be professional about the situation rather than brushing it off and giving their standard statement.

title: Please fix this problem!
text: Ok, i‚Äôve been using YT for years and i love it! But there is a huge problem. I can‚Äôt play the videos or shorts anymore. Everytime i play a video, the screen just says ‚ÄúSomething went wrong. Tap to retry.‚Äú And everytime i do, it says it over and over again. And it refreshes the videos at the bottom. I can‚Äôt seem to use YT on my iPhone 13 anymore, but it works on my iPad and other iPhone (i‚Äôm a Apple user) And i‚Äôm using alternate apps rn. So please fix this problem. I did everything! I deleted and reinstalled it. Still doesn‚Äôt play a vid. I have been using the website too. And it works on the website. And i‚Äôve checked for updates, no updates but it still won‚Äôt play a single video!! Please just fix it!

title: Write a Review
text: A recent survey by Grunge done on You Tube showed the answer to a poll question ‚ÄúYou have to get rid of one, which is it?‚Äù as the following:  Facebook 51%, Twitter 25%, Reddit 14%, Instagram 9% and You Tube 1%.  It was surprising that half of people could live without Facebook.  I chose Twitter because I was being harassed there by a certain party and they wouldn‚Äôt leave me alone.  So I abandoned a Twitter handle that I had for 10 years and it was a popular one.  Someone is probably happy that they snatched it up.  I could also live without Facebook, however I am realizing that despite its shortcomings, Facebook is better than Twitter because it doesn‚Äôt limit the character count and it lets you know if someone replied or acknowledged your comment.

title: Needs improvement but alright
text: First thing is censorship. I mean I guess it would be fine to do that to videos if there WASN‚ÄôT an app for kids. A lot of videos I want to watch end up making me sign up which is annoying. Second thing is when you go back to the video after going to home. It shrinks it and puts it to the corner of the video and you have to full screen the video and half the time when you exit the video to look at comments, it does the same freaking thing! Last thing is what happens after the ads. When the ads end, the video freezes and then speeds up. I need to restart the video which is just as annoying. PLEASE fix these problems because they really are annoying me! I apologize for being pushy but I think it needs to be done

title: You tube tug boat rebuild
text: I did the same thing to a boat built in 1932 by bath iron works, it was a quarantine boat that operated in Chesapeake bay, then converted to a city fire boat for Wilmington NC I bought the boat at the time I was a chief engineer on a docking tug for the Army, but had to sale it when desert freedom started in lraq, I was working 12 hrs on and 12 hrs off and didn‚Äôt have time to work on it, I kept these hours for 6 months straight without a day off. I didn‚Äôt know how long this would go on so against my better judgment I had to sell it, l am now 77 years old and regret my selling my tug boat, it was 65 ft all steel hull l even contacted the builder and they sent me pictures from the day they laid the keel until it was launched.

title: The future of our economy as it relates to our depleting oil/energy reserves
text: There are some very interesting interviews here about where we need to go to avoid an economic crash. Not just doomsday BS, but ideas about pathways to a successful transition into what is likely to be a simpler, but better future. All of this is related to oil reserves getting so low as to be too expensive to extract and we don‚Äôt want those hydrocarbons in our atmosphere to begin with. And it directly links oil energy to our economy...energy that can‚Äôt be replaced with the alternatives we are currently anticipating to save us. What we need to do is start consuming less energy, less material goods now, before we are forced to in an inevitable crises

title: Satisfactory and unsatisfactory
text: I have Ben using this app for mor than 20 years it has provided lots of entertainment and knowledge but and I understand that your money comes throughout your use of adds it‚Äôs a bit ridiculous the amount of adds I watch on here I can‚Äôt set a play list without getting stuck in a 1/2 hour infomercial you need to limit add length and make it go away I watch lots of videos that have hour plus run times and I have to keep hitting skip add run the add and be done stop interrupting what I‚Äôm watching for the same content that doesn‚Äôt even apply to my interest. This is just my opinion and I will still use you tube I just do it frustrated. Thank you

title: Hmmmm.....
text: Today i went into YT and knew something wasnt right. Now I know everyone loves YT but ive been having problems w it lately. For starters, its been glitching in and out while all of my other apps are just fine. Also, today when i opened it, it wiuld only let me watch certain videos and was saying to turn off restricted mode, so I went into settings and turned it off. But then it still said that restricted mode was on so i went back into settings and kept trying different things, when i saw it need to be updated. I updated it and I still could only watch half the videos. and most videos i wanted to watch are from people i sub to and i try to be as consistent as possible. But now i cant even watch their videos and im very angry. YT please do something about this.

title: Love the app,but some new features have made it somewhat annoying
text: What annoys me the most is the amount of ads recently, especially before a video. I used to not mind it because it would play one before the video, then one or two during the video, and then one after. But recently, before a video starts, I will get to commercials, one after another. It‚Äôs quite annoying, especially when I can‚Äôt skip both of them. Very confused as to what all of a sudden this is a thing. Besides that, sometimes, when I‚Äôm not even trying to or on accident, It‚Äôll swipe the video to the left or the right, and play the next video, and when I try to swipe back I‚Äôll always get an add, which is very annoying because I didn‚Äôt even want to go to a different video anyway.

title: LOVE THE APP OVERALL
text:
Ok. So yeah like a quite of few people I‚Äôm a youtuber. And so far it‚Äôs going good. I watch other YT videos for hours every day and I love the convenience of them. But if there‚Äôs one thing that I would have to say about it as a YouTuber I want to use the community tab to post my art and some polls I want to make for my followers but I can‚Äôt do that because apparently I don‚Äôt have enough followers. Amount of followers shouldn‚Äôt matter I should be able to post on the community tab if I have at least 5 followers which I do. I don‚Äôt know about you but I feel like it would help me grow my channel. If you could maybe at least let more people use it that would help me a lot and I just might give you guys those 5 stars! Thanks for listening! 

                                           Love~ Qumi Cutie

title: Great app but problem with sound...
text: This app overall is a great app but for some reason whenever I go on the app for the first time in a day the sound on every video either is non existent or it's just a buzzing sound, but it's only for the actual video. The ads before the videos still have their regular sound. I've asked my friends if they have the same problem but no one else has a problem with the sound. I have the most recent update of the app and my phone has IOS 10.2 so not the most recent update with my phone but it's done that since before IOS 11.0.1 came out. I don't know if it has to do with my phone or the app because restarting my phone will fix the problem but it's just annoying to have to do it everyday whenever I first get on the app.

title: Many Playback Issues on iPhone 14 Pro
text: I used iOS 16 betas on my iPhone 13 Pro and the app worked fine. Once I upgraded to the new iPhone 14 Pro I‚Äôve been having issues that are getting very annoying. I start a video and it plays for about 30 seconds and then it stops. I tap the screen and the time played shows 0:00 so I have to start again and try to fast forward to where I was. It‚Äôs super laggy when you try to fast forward and it‚Äôll pause again many times after starting at a different point in the video and show it‚Äôs farther back then where you were and you have to blindly fast forward again to find where you were. Loading is weird as well, I check my connection and it‚Äôs very good so that‚Äôs definitely not the issue. I‚Äôve killed the app, restarted the phone, deleted and re-installed the app, nothing has helped.

title: Animation FPS problem
text: Obviously the most unbeatable social app. But I‚Äôm not here for that today. There‚Äôs been a serve problem when I upload animations. (Specifically from CapCut). The animations I make once I see them in my files and on their program are completely fine, but I have to use a video editing app for the audio which is CapCut. But when I upload them onto your platform, the animation becomes completely ruined and looks janky and cluttered. The reason why I brought up CapCut because when I upload the animation itself without it being editing in CapCut, it‚Äôs completely fine. And when I put the animation onto CapCut, it‚Äôs also completely fine. But when I upload the CapCut version onto your plateform. It‚Äôs a mess. Is it CapCut, or your app?

title: Read this before getting the app!
text:
This is a great app, with the entertainment levels to 80%! But the other 20% you ask? That is where it goes downhill, but I‚Äôm gonna say some good stuff before the bad stuff.

First of all, Great entertainment app! I nearly use it everyday and I can watch my favorite videos on the app. It‚Äôs a fun experience until  This happened.....

There are toxic people insulting other people because of their statement/opinion!! This is not good and I actually have Been in a argument twice. One of them was grammar the other was telling them the truth! They were so stubborn, I‚Äôm not gonna say who it was though, but this is stupid!! I hate stupid arguments because sometimes people are VERY toxic  so toxic I can‚Äôt even describe but I‚Äôm not gonna say who it was though, again. 

Overall, Great app! I recommend this app to anyone who likes good entertainment because this is the app for you! But be careful in the comments... there are toxic people at the reply sections of comments. But you got to get the app! It‚Äôs a fun experience minus the toxic people there üòí if you do want something like for example: you wanted fnaf SFMS (five nights at Freddy‚Äôs animations witch I enjoy) this is the app for you people!

title: The wide vast amount of information that is shared responsively

title: No highlighted reply.
text: When you get a reply on your inbox on  the mobile version on iOS doesn‚Äôt take you to the comment. It just takes you to the video and you have to find the reply that is lost in the abundance of thousands of comments posted under the video. And the inbox doesn‚Äôt show the entire comment reply and doesn‚Äôt have the option to reply to a replied from the inbox. Feels like something is broken. i gave up on engaging with other users because the highlighted reply feature is swept under the rug and forgotten. It‚Äôs been that way for years. I have to go to my laptop to view replies because it takes you straights to the comment reply. But I‚Äôm not at my laptop 80% of the time.

title: Yellowstone Dutton Ranch interview
text: I really enjoyed the interview. All of the actors were down to earth. I loved what each one of them had to say about the show and about the characters that they played. The writer/ producer, not sure of his actual title Taylor is awesome at what he does. He keeps everything interesting and motivates me to continue watching. I can hardly get enough of these awesome actors. I love all of their individual roles, it suits the actors. My favorite is Beth. My least favorite is Monica, she whines too much. I can hardly wait for season five. I don‚Äôt normally watch tv. I‚Äôm 65 years old and my oldest daughter is 44. She‚Äôs the one that told me to watch it. She knew that I like Kevin Costner. I‚Äôm one happy viewer. Thank you a million.

title: Possible Bug?
text: I have been using the app on all of my phones for years and love it. Something recently started happening though. When I‚Äôm watching a video, and leave the app to look at a text message and then come back there is audio playing in the background that sounds like an ad. I leave the app(but not fully close it out) and it takes 3 attempts to stop the background talking. I sometimes do fully close the app out but that is getting annoying because I don‚Äôt want to have to either go to my history to find the video or have to re-search for it.  Not sure if this is happening to others. Just wanted to make the company aware of the issue that I‚Äôm going through currently. If that gets fixed/ I get a solution then I think the app is 5/5

title: Needs to work on the player
text: I like some of the functions of the app‚Ä¶ but it does not get 5 stars because the player makes it very very hard to skip to where I need to while watching videos‚Ä¶ I have gotten so used to the skip 15 seconds ahead or behind function I often leave the app to use safari because I can conveniently skip through things and I like to save multiple tabs at once often I am in safari and I see a video I really want to watch later so I open it in a safari tab and leave it there. I don‚Äôt really like using the ‚Äúsave for later button‚Äù in the app not as convenient as have multiple tabs that I can sort through!

title: Quit deleting reviews
text:
I feel like they update just to get rid of bad reviews. I don't even remember now what my other complaints were, so the comment system's still annoying; haven't used it since they changed it and I keep hoping it'll change back. Wish you could at the very least turn off the distracting comment preview or just have any settings about how comments are displayed. 

I much prefer the suggested videos in the middle of and comments being endless scroll instead of having all comments and descriptions in their own stupid boxes that you can't have open at the same time. The X button on the right used to close one reply thread and now closes ALL of the comments every single time and it's annoying. Most people are right handed and closing a thread is more likely to be what they're going to be doing than exiting out of the entire comment section so why the flip? garbage.

title: A Satisfying Service All Round!
text:
You Tube Premium Music remains a
mainstay as I pursue my days hours ,
and minutes. I get front virtual seats at
live concerts. Often the service offers
me a suggestion or will cue up an
interview of a singer I am fond of listening 
to. I play a Relax My Cat download for
my little cat Ashleylee. When I turn on
the cat TV the cats go directly over to
the TV screen to commune with
handsome black squirrels and interesting
looking panaceas of other animals. I
find it helps Ashley relax since she was
severely traumatized as a young kitten.
Relax My Cat is doing everything it is
touted to accomplish. Ashley has really 
opened up and she is 20.
I listen to sounds of rain and thunder 
(my favorite) or snowstorm sounds.
So many choices!
My very very favorite is getting to know 
and appreciate the lives of the artists 
who move me such as young Frankie 
Lymon.  I listen thru the night now and
then with my earphones in- catching
up to live concerts I may have skipped
over. You Tube Premium Music is a part
of my life and I immerse myself in it-
diving deeply into classical, jazz and
theater clips catching my fancy. A 
satisfying service all round!

y‚Äôall want to win the war then u may hv to lose a few battles. title: YT Premium
text:
Uodate.  Had a discrepancy between YT Premium amount and what was billed from PP.  Contacted YT who responded within a couple days.  It was taxes which I understand; I just hadn‚Äôt noticed before.  If you have a question on the end amount being billed versus your premium, log into Google and view your account‚Ä¶.it‚Äôs all right there.  You won‚Äôt see any line item detail on your bank charge or PP.

Basic YT is awful because of the ridiculous ads, so I upgraded at the suggestion of someone else and am glad I did. It‚Äôs not perfect but then nothing is. I do wish ALL the videos and shorts had a mute icon so when some creator adds some music at maximum volume we could quickly mute on a phone.

title: Pretty descent tech but with a creep catch
text: I like the tech of you tube. The platform is functional. Good even. However the creepy 1984 Totalitarianism-esque we knows what‚Äôs best for you smacks of a belief of the management that they somehow own their audience specifically and can make decisions on what you are allowed to view that are not violating decency and legal standards by de-plat forming, de-monetizing and just generally bullying viewers and creators. After a while you get sick of dealing with the lies and blatant falsehoods. Obviously some of it is bad actor employees using their position to play at politics like bullying children but that brings into question company management even further as they have no oversight and review of employees and the work they are doing. There is far too much politics involved in the management of the tools and that is truly a shame because it is destroying a perfectly good piece of tech.

title: Confused
text: I watch a lot of You Tube videos, but what I find confusing is they shut down Dr. John Gilmore‚Äôs channel because it was to graphic but I ran across several videos of a lady talking about the shape of a penis and it showed the actual penis.  Or you have people that steal others videos and take credit for it.  There are some really gross videos out their but Dr Gilmore is a doctor that shows helpful surgeries and shows us what happens when people don‚Äôt take care of themselves.  I don‚Äôt think the penis videos showed me anything that I needed.  I love Dr Sandra Lee but their is an idiot that shows all her video and names his channel the same as hers but he added one letter difference.  So some of us can be idiots and nothing is done but others that are helping gets shut down.  What is wrong with You Tube.

title: Censorship Needs to stop
text: I love you guys,and the setup is always improving,very noticeable. Also, the censorship is real because people say it is,and unfortunately that‚Äôs the new world. If you don‚Äôt censor free speech,not vulgar speech that is not common in a public place,you will win over even more folks and also stop the conspiracy theories about it. It should be fine to share,and say things that you think about,or would gain more views and viewers,as if you shadow ban,you are losing Money, the people who want to see it will see it,and those who don‚Äôt want to see it will watch and share to all their friends,and we have a true town hall ,market square,and fair and square,and you guys win ? People will watch you more,see advertising more,etc‚Ä¶

title: Must autoplay all within a playlist
text:
My previous review complained about notification grouping and always playing all. You‚Äôve fixed that, thank you. 

Now I‚Äôm here to complain about Play All on a playlist. It looks like a button defaulted to On, but it‚Äôs not. The next video starts immediately after one ends. There‚Äôs no way to shut it off. If I‚Äôm playing another creator‚Äôs playlist, I don‚Äôt necessarily want to play them all, more likely I want to pick and choose. And I likely won‚Äôt get through the whole thing in one sitting.

And also, sorting one of my playlists.  Nice you have a sort button, but it seems to be missing one obvious option.  Alphabetical. I‚Äôd like to be able to add a video knowing it‚Äôs not already in the list.  You do have a manual option, thanks for that. But it‚Äôs clunky and tedious for a long playlist. I don‚Äôt get why so many date options but no alphabetical. Please add this option.

title: Needs a lot of fixes
text:
A.Too many ads i mean like for real every video is just apple this premium that or has this ever happened to you. I get that youtubers get payed like that but theres way too many ads.
B.How and why does it keep on saying error subscribing to channel?
C.Demonetization makes no sense because you wont tell youtubers what error they made or for the littlest offensive thing boom demonetized.
This app is great but has too many errors that have been here for months and you only reply with "Sorry about that why don't you try getting premium" or in others words "We don't care about your concerns we only money and we demonetize people for whatever reason we can"

title: Not loading
text: I just find it funny that when I want to watch a video it won‚Äôt actually load it even in its lowest quality. Once I keep reloading the app the video starts playing‚Ä¶at least I thought. It‚Äôs the 1/2 ads. Ohh but those load in their 1080p quality right ? It‚Äôs really funny to me, how my video won‚Äôt load but ads will and the fact that they do in the highest quality is even funnier. No I don‚Äôt have slow internet btw, and I‚Äôm not in some 3rd world country or in the middle of some Wisconsin woods. I‚Äôm im the city. It‚Äôs usually in the afternoon so non of that stupid oh the internet traffic at night slows things down. Ultimately it comes down to me ranting about this video streaming app prioritizing ads over the consumers choice. Yes premium exists but why ? When it wasn‚Äôt needed 5 years ago.

title: Navigating needs help
text: Navigating around the app is a nightmare. Doesn‚Äôt make sense that a top tier app is this difficult to move around in and find videos. Here‚Äôs an experiment that shows what I mean. Watch a video, then start another one. See how many steps it takes to try to find the video you just watched. Not even a simple back button? Maybe there is an easier way to do it but if so that doesn‚Äôt change my mind about the app since the way to do it wasn‚Äôt made obvious to me. One last thing - why can‚Äôt we download the videos to watch later in the free version? The video isn‚Äôt commercial content - it‚Äôs basically a home movie so what‚Äôs the big deal about downloading? I don‚Äôt always have WiFi / cell available so I can‚Äôt view the video again until I do. Annoying.

title: Please stop changing things and focus on maintenance.
text:
Every little interface change is a new annoyance. Some of the things that get added are so poorly thought out that I don‚Äôt understand how they made it out of concept phase. A new ‚Äúrecommend more like this‚Äù button appeared in the place where the ‚Äúadd to watch later‚Äù button used to be. Why would I want recommendations based on a video I haven‚Äôt even watched? There‚Äôs no unclicking that button. 

Don‚Äôt even get me started on comments and playlists showing up on the sidebar while watching a video in landscape. I rotated my phone in order to make the video bigger, not smaller. Everything worked better before those views were available in landscape. 

Then there‚Äôs the persistent issue where sometimes autorotate and gestures just completely stop working until the video is minimized. This bug has existed for actual years.

title: Best social media platform :)
text:
This is genuinely the best social media platform! It‚Äôs not as toxic as a lot of others, depending on what you watch. But there‚Äôs anything & everything you wanna watch. They‚Äôre recommendations for what they think you wanna watch are rly good & accurate! Everything is free at the cost of having to watch maybe an add or two through a video. But the ads actually support the creator so it‚Äôs a good thing! If you don‚Äôt want ads you can jus pay about 20$ a month for no ads & you can download videos to where if you have no internet you can still watch the videos you downloaded!

Personally it‚Äôs my favorite social media platform & I rly recommend it :)

title: Feature
text:
We can save a public playlist, but it would be nice to be able to copy a playlist to add to your own playlist. For example, I needed to make a new account, so I searched a public playlist that I made with my old account and saved the playlist. The old account will eventually get deleted because I do not fully own the account, and if I want to make a new version I will have to save each one at a time to a new playlist, which could take a long time. It would also be nice for making a supercompiled playlist out of some of my smaller lists. 

Also the comments being moved is strange; I often accidentally go to the channel of the video I am watching instead of the comments because it is hard to tell which is which at a glance

title: New video quality selection
text: Please either revert to the old quality selection or introduce a way for us to choose for it to use the highest possible quality on the video for every video. Even though I went in the settings and chose ‚Äúhigher quality‚Äù for all videos it is only ever 720p so I have to change the quality on every single video. At least the old would remember within a session the quality you selected last so I could just watch a 2160p60 video and check that quality and all videos after that would be in highest quality. Since I watch a lot of HQ videos this new system is extremely annoying as it only makes the quality system harder to change, and now I have to manually change it every single video. On the other hand, THANK YOU for removing shorts, that was the most annoying thing you‚Äôve ever done, thank you for getting rid of that tab.
